mapper.sql: a.law_case_id AS "lawCaseId", a.type AS "type", a.publish_time AS "publishTime", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM LAW_CASE a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
AND a.content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%' '%'+#{content}+'%' concat('%',#{content},'%')
AND (a.type = '1' OR a.type ='2')
AND a.type = '3'
AND a.type = '4'
AND a.type = '5'
AND a.type = '6'
AND a.type = '7'
AND a.type = '8'
AND a.type = '9'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LAW_CASE( law_case_id, type, publish_time, title, remarks, content, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{lawCaseId}, #{type}, #{publishTime}, #{title}, #{remarks}, #{content}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE LAW_CASE SET type = #{type}, publish_time = #{publishTime}, title = #{title}, remarks = #{remarks}, content = #{content}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE law_case_id = #{lawCaseId}
